GetPosColor.description:
DRGBPICKER [Client] 

[number] x
  The X coordinate on the texture to get the color from

[number] y
  The Y coordinate on the texture to get the color from

GetRGB.description: DRGBPICKER [Client] Returns the color currently set on the color picker.

OnChange.description:
DRGBPICKER [Client] Function which is called when the cursor is clicked and/or moved on the color picker. Meant to be overridden.

[table] col
  The color that is selected on the color picker (Color structure form).

SetRGB.description:
DRGBPICKER [Client] Sets the color stored in the color picker.

[table] color
  The color to set, see Color structure.
